title: Hail to the King
info: Rated: M - English - Romance/Supernatural - Chapters: 2 - Words: 11,479 - Reviews: 75 - Favs: 473 - Follows: 688 - Updated:
- Published:
- [Naruto U., Rias G.] H. Akeno, T. Koneko
summary: He had always been selfless and more than just a little nosy. That meddlesome nature of his had landed him in trouble more than once before. This was really no different. Even in a world not his own, he wouldn't sit idly by. He was not a spectator. A stranger in a strange land, he would bring the peace as once prophesied. Or he would bring the fire. Redemption or damnation.
